}}{{Quote|Start your festive season with some Minecraft magic this Christmas with the official Minecraft Advent Calendar.|Product details}}The '''''Minecraft Advent Calendar: Book Collection''''' is a ''Minecraft'' book authored by [[Mojang AB]].

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|
Stuffed to the brim with fun things to do, this Minecraft advent calendar will keep you entertained throughout the entire holiday period.

The 24 pockets include festive bite-size builds, jolly activity books, adorable baubles, hilarious jokes, fun challenges, how to draw mobs and more.

'''The perfect advent calendar for any Minecraft fan!'''
|{{cn}}}}
